name: lemmy
description: Integrate Lemmy, and it will comment your PRs, answering a vital question "Lemme know what's going on my CI server"
author: Krzysztof Miemiec <krzysztof.miemiec@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: mkdir -p reports && tslint './src/**/*.{js,ts}' --project ./ --format json --out './reports/lint.json' || tslint './src/**/*.{js,ts}' --project ./ --format stylish
scripts.build: tsc && babel build --out-dir dist && yarn gen-docs
